profiles.views
==============

.. py:module:: profiles.views


Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   profiles.views.logger


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   profiles.views.index
   profiles.views.profile


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: logger

.. py:function:: index(request)

   View function for displaying the list of all user profiles.


.. py:function:: profile(request, username)

   View function for displaying the details of a specific user's profile.
